The access to the EarthServer Science Gateway requires federated credentials issued by an Identity Provider. If the organisation you belong to has an Identity Provider registered in an official Identity Federation, click on Sign In button below and select your federation and provider.
Otherwise you can get federated credentials registering to the open Identity Provider which belongs to the GrIDP federation
